main event: Two unidentified flying objects reported over Pineville, Louisiana on July 15, 1949, were later determined to be part of a hoax.
interesting points: The objects were described as looking like stove lids., They were reported to be dark in color and appeared to float in the air., The sighting was covered in the local newspaper as the first report of flying saucers in the area., The investigation found that the original sighting report was fictitious and created for fun., Three individuals, including newspaper employees, were identified as the hoax instigators.
sighted object: two flying objects resembling stove lids
witness description: individuals from the local area, including Brother O'Neal and Freasy Hanks
